alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 8:37AM CST until further notice by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River at Liberty affecting Liberty County. Trinity River near Moss Bluff affecting Chambers and Liberty Counties. For the Trinity River...including Liberty, Moss Bluff...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River near Moss Bluff. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.2 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins in the vicinity of the gage. At 15.2 feet, Moderate lowland flooding begins in the vicinity of the gage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 14.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 AM CST Tuesday was 15.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.0 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.2 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.9 feet on 05/15/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Trinity River Moss Bluff 12.2 14.8 Tue 7 am CST 14.9 14.8 14.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening.late tonight at 245 AM CST.
